[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Capacity Building unit targets building research capacity of the center and its key partners. Again, the unit is responsible to develop short and long term plan. Currently the unit is coordinating different on line training to advance staff capacity to do the job and attain the Mission of NDMC establishment which is to improve the health of the public through presenting high quality evidence for decisions making for the federal Ministry of Health and other stakeholder’s.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Opportunities of on line training at NDMC.

  • GBD on line training(IHME)
  • Introduction to Research Ethics
  • M&E fundamentals from Global Health
  • Knowledge management from Global Health
  • Data Quality from Global Healh
  • Data Use for program mangers
  • Data Visualization –An introduction
  • GIS Technique’s

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
